resources.string: Enthusiastic and technically proficient recent graduate with a good foundation in computer science and a passion for Android app development. Possess good problem solving skills and a keen interest in creating user-friendly mobile applications. Eager to apply my technical expertise and innovative thinking to contribute effectively to a project and the development team.
>Database Management and Tools: Sql, Firebase, MongoDb
>Ticket Booking App: A Train ticket booking application for android. Built using XML, JAVA and FIREBASE.
> Password Manager: An android application to manage users password locally on their device. Built using XML, JAVA.
>Expense Tracker: An Expense Tracker web application built using AngularJS.
